title: No, there was no hand wearing a sense of " naive " or" naive " during the first discussion
subtitle: Conspiracy theories about high-tech devices were broadcast through social media after the first presidential debate in 2020.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The 2020 Democratic Candidate (Joe Biden) was wearing "wire" and high-tech contact lenses that allowed him to receive talking points from an invisible third party during the first presidential debate.
